allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add CLAUDE.md for Claude Code guidance

Provides future Claude Code instances with build commands, architecture
overview, authority document precedence, and non-negotiable constraints
distilled from PROJECT_BRIEF.md and AGENTS.md.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jasoncavinder/Projects/Helm add .gitignore apps/macos-ui/README.md apps/macos-ui/Helm.xcodeproj/project.pbxproj apps/macos-ui/Helm/HelmApp.swift apps/macos-ui/Helm/AppDelegate.swift apps/macos-ui/Helm/Assets.xcassets/Contents.json apps/macos-ui/Helm/Helm.entitlements apps/macos-ui/Helm/Info.plist)

Bash(git -C /Users/jasoncavinder/Projects/Helm commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Xcode 14 project scaffold for macOS menu bar app

Set up the SwiftUI menu bar utility in apps/macos-ui/ targeting
macOS 12.0 \(Monterey\). The app runs as an LSUIElement with no Dock
icon, using NSApplicationDelegateAdaptor and NSStatusItem for the
system status bar.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add TokioProcessExecutor with real process spawning and termination

Implements ProcessExecutor and RunningProcess traits using
tokio::process::Command. Supports process_group\(0\) isolation,
SIGTERM/SIGKILL termination via libc::kill, and timeout enforcement.
Includes 7 integration tests against real system binaries.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add ProcessHomebrewSource backed by ProcessExecutor

Implements HomebrewSource trait using a ProcessExecutor to run
structured Homebrew commands. Reuses existing request builders
for detect, list_installed, list_outdated, and search operations.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
test: add end-to-end Homebrew orchestration integration tests

Proves the full orchestration path from AdapterRuntime through
HomebrewAdapter<ProcessHomebrewSource> to a routing fake executor.
Covers detect, list_installed, list_outdated, search, and structured
error propagation. Updates 0.3 kickoff plan to mark all exit criteria
as met.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
